Title: Introduction to Java and Object-Oriented Programming
Short Intro: This course provides an introduction to the Java language and object-oriented programming, including an overview of Java syntax and how it differs from a language like Python.  Students will learn how to write custom Java classes and methods, and how to test their code using unit testing and test-driven development.  Topics include basic data structures like Arrays and ArrayLists and overloading methods.
Skills: Java Tools,Unit Testing,Java Programming,Object-Oriented Programming (OOP),Java Syntax,
